name: video-to-gif
title: Video to GIF Converter
description: Convert video clips to animated GIF files
content:
Overview

This application converts video clips to animated GIF files. Built using MoviePy, it allows you to specify the time range, resolution, and frame rate for optimal GIF creation.

Features

  • Convert entire videos or specific time ranges to GIF
  • Customizable output resolution and frame rate
  • Maintains original video aspect ratio
  • Automatic optimization for file size

Parameters

  • Input Video: Upload your video file from stash
  • Start Time: Start time in seconds (default: 0)
  • Duration: Duration of the clip in seconds (default: 5)
  • GIF Width: Width in pixels (default: 480px, height calculated automatically)
  • Frame Rate: Frames per second in GIF (default: 10)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates an animated GIF file named with the time range (e.g., video_0.00s-5.00s.gif).

Use Cases

  • Creating animated previews for social media
  • Converting video highlights to shareable GIFs
  • Creating looping animations from video clips
  • Generating GIF memes or reactions
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; [ ! -d "$REPO_DIR" ] && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/video_to_gif.py" "${videoFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -s ${startTime} -d ${duration} -w ${width} -f ${fps}
